name: npc_dota_hero_tusk
bio_loc:
It had been a brawl to remember. There stood Ymir, the Tusk, the Terror from the Barrier, the Snowball from Cobalt, the only fighter to have bested the Bristled Bruiser in a fair fight, and now the last man standing in Wolfsden Tavern. What started as a simple bar bet of supremacy ended with four regulars, a blacksmith, and six of the Frost Brigade's best soldiers writhing against the shards and splinters of almost every bottle, mug, and chair in the building. The Tusk boasted and toasted his victory as he emptied his brew.

No sooner had the defeated regained consciousness than the cries for double-or-nothing rang out. The Tusk was pleased at the prospect, but none could think of a bet bigger than the one he just conquered. Horrified at the damage to his tavern and desperate to avoid another brawl, the barkeep had an idea. As skilled as he was, Ymir had never taken part in a real battle, never tested himself against the indiscriminate death and chaos of war. He proposed a wager to the fighter: seek out the biggest battle he could find, survive, and win it for whichever side he chose. The stakes? The next round of drinks.
hype_loc: Tusk is always eager to start a fight. Able to instantly corner an enemy with a wall of ice shards, he gathers with his allies and rolls into enemies inside of a massive snowball, bringing him in range to land his signature knockout punch.
npe_desc_loc: Snowballs into his enemies to stun

facets.description_loc: Tusk can cast Tag Team causing nearby enemies to receive bonus damage from attacks.
facets.name: tusk_facet_tag_team

facets.description_loc: Tusk can cast Drinking Buddies, pulling him and a teammate closer and granting both bonus Movement Speed and Attack Damage.
facets.name: tusk_facet_fist_bump

abilities.name: tusk_ice_shards
abilities.desc_loc: Tusk compresses shards of ice into a ball of frozen energy that damages all enemies it comes in contact with. When the ball reaches its target destination the shards are released, creating a barrier that lasts for %shard_duration% seconds.
abilities.lore_loc: In the frozen tundra near the Barrier, after the last sun of autumn has set, ice can form with alarming speed.
abilities.shard_loc: Increases depth of Ice Shards, and enemies trapped within an ice shard are slowed and take damage per second.

abilities.name: tusk_snowball
abilities.desc_loc: Tusk begins rolling into a snowball. Allies within a %snowball_grab_radius% radius can also be added to the snowball by right-clicking on them, even while the snowball is moving. Once launched, any enemies caught in the snowball's path will be stunned and take damage. Each allied Hero in the snowball will add to its damage and stun duration.
abilities.lore_loc: Tales are still told of the wild feat that ended the grand brawl at White Fields.
notes_loc: The snowball will break apart a maximum of 3 seconds after launch.
The snowball can be launched early by pressing using the Launch Snowball ability.
Doesn't carry illusions, but will carry Meepo clones and other units that Tusk controls.
Each Meepo clone added to the snowball will add its own bonus damage.
Allies can click on a snowball to add themselves to it.

abilities.name: tusk_walrus_kick
abilities.desc_loc: Kicks the closest enemy unit in the drawn direction, stunning, damaging, and slowing them. Also deals damage to all heroes within %search_radius% radius of its landing area. Cooldown is reduced by %creep_cooldown_reduction_pct%%% if kicking a creep.
abilities.lore_loc: Tusk may have made his name with his fists, but the wise enemy is wary of any and all limbs.

abilities.name: tusk_bitter_chill
abilities.desc_loc: Passively slows the attack speed of all enemies within %radius% radius.

abilities.name: tusk_walrus_punch
abilities.desc_loc: Tusk connects with his mighty Walrus Punch, a critical strike with bonus damage so powerful it launches its victim into the air.
abilities.lore_loc: It never matters who throws the first punch, only who throws the last.

talents.name: special_bonus_unique_tusk_4
talents.desc_loc: Walrus Punch gains a chance to be triggered on normal attacks, independent of mana cost or cooldown.

abilities.name: tusk_tag_team
abilities.desc_loc: Activate to temporarily apply a negative debuff aura around you, causing enemies that are attacked under it to take bonus physical damage and reduced movement speed. Lasts %debuff_duration% seconds.
abilities.lore_loc: Even far from Cobalt, Tusk carries the 'Barrier Chill' in his very bones.
notes_loc: Affects attacks from allied heroes, Tusk or any of his units.

abilities.name: tusk_drinking_buddies
abilities.desc_loc: Tusk reaches out to tag an allied unit, pulling them closer. Once tagged, both Tusk and his tagged ally gain movement speed and attack damage. Can be put on alt-cast to only pull Tusk towards his ally with %alt_cast_castrange_pct%%% reduced cast range.
notes_loc: Doesn't pull Tusk or targeted ally if they are within %min_distance% range of each other.
